name: Great Zimbabwe
description: Ancient stone city and UNESCO World Heritage Site.
healthTips: Pack a small first-aid kit (plasters, pain relief).
safetyTips: Keep valuables secure in crowded areas.

name: Victoria Falls
description: One of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World and a UNESCO site.
healthTips: Wear a rain jacket near the spray zone.
safetyTips: Follow all safety signs near edges and viewpoints.
Use licensed tour guides for activities.
